title: Oscar Luis Vera
text: Oscar Luis Vera (born 11 May 1976 in <a href="Santa%20Fe%2C%20Argentina">Santa Fe</a>) is an <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> defender. He currently plays for <a href="Club%20Bamin%20Real%20Potos%C3%AD">Club Bamin Real Potosí</a>.
